data.name: We Are One Demo
data.description:
Full version releasing June 1!

Work together with yourself in VR! 
We Are One Demo is a puzzle shooter where you solve mind-bending puzzles by cloning yourself and playing with time loops. Cleverly plan ahead and cooperate with your own clones - the only help you really need (and get) is yourself!

‚ÄúWe Are One Demo‚Äù in a nutshell:
*All your teammates are You. If you want something done right do it yourself!
*Big-brain puzzles meet action-packed shooter elements
*Experience a variety of levels with increasing challenges and new twists for you to overcome in your OWN way!
*A unique art style, where watercolor textures meet digitally drawn lines and moody vibes!
*Perfect for VR beginners and experienced users - It's easy to pick up, but challenging to master!
*No artificial locomotion and only teleportation is used

We are actively working on a paid full version with a story and more content! A level editor will be included in the full game in a later update.
Previously known as "Help Yourself"

changelog.change_log: update mainmenu and game finished screens

* fix some cases where players could get stuck in the tutorial
* add new level won effects
* add new pistol animations
* a bunch of quality of life changes

Rework environment of several levels 

Some UI improvements

* Fix game freeze in Junkyard level when letting go of shield
* Fix magazines still visible when exploded
* Fix magazine still grabbed when reloading weapon and still holding down the grab button
* Changed the controller colours to be more saturated and changed the button highlight color in the tutorial
* Some visual fixes for terrains and effects
* Fix exploit in Save a Noob where you could shoot the robot arm behind the container
* Fix wrong ammo count in Timey Twisty where the spawnpoint behind the wall had 7 instead of 4 shots.
* Add option to hide the UI on level win by default
* Fix some cases in levels where the spawnpoint sprite was under the terrain
* Fix potential bug where you could be stuck in a black screen when the loop ended
* Some more small UI and tutorial fixes

* New Name - We got a new name Help Yourself is now called We Are One
* Improved Lighting & VFX - We reworked our graphics with new lighting and effects
* Reworked and designed new level environments
* Overhauled Models- New enemy models, controller models and spawnpoints
* New Levels - 11 new levels, some easy and some pretty demanding
* New Tutorial - A reworked tutorial for a better experience, tell us how you like it!
* New Options - Turn off turning or change your height
* Fixed an exploit with leaderboards and the pause menu
* Add speedrun timer
* Add more sounds
- small improvements to the tutorial levels

* Brand new mechanic (try it out yourself, no spoiler here üòâ)
* Six new tricky levels!
* Big art update:
  * New assets - more factory vibes
  * Spawn in from Mother Nature's hands
  * New hand-drawn VFX
  * Improved visuals
* Magazines explode when shot
* Many minor optimizations, fixes and quality of life improvements
